Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This was accepted as evidence for propranolol being the cause of this conduction disorder .

| --- |

The entity "conduction disorder" is identified as a disease in the paragraph. It is a condition where the heart's electrical signals are not conducted properly, causing the heart to beat irregularly.

The entity "conduction disorder" is identified as a disease in the paragraph. The other term "propranolol" is a medication and not a disease, so it is not included in the table.
